Data Flow Summary> 1. Extract features (X) from raw data> 2. Collect labels (Y) for supervised> 3. Split into training (80%)> learning> and test (20%)> 4. Train model on training data> 5. Test model on unseen test data> 6. Watch for overfitting> to learn patterns> (train >> test)>
